Name: Constrict
Description:
Choose an enemy. That enemy can't attack during the Enemies Attack step of the next night.
Rotate a card on your parnter's field.

Name: Strike
Description: Deal 1 damage. If you have played another action with your partner's icon this turn, deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Sideswipe
Description: Deal 3 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Consume
Description:
Draw all the cards in your partner's hand.
Perform your draw ability.
If you have played another action with your partner's icon this turn, your partner performs their draw ability.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 8 damage divided as you choose between any number of enemies.
